links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..50
formula: G.f.: 1/2*(G(0) - 1/(1+x)) where G(k) = 1 - x*(2*k+1)^2/(1 - x*(2*k+2)^2/G(k+1) );  (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Feb 09 2013a(n) ~ (2*n)! * (2/Pi)^(2*n+1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: More terms from Harvey P. Dale, Apr 27 2012
